item.title: First reading, referred to Finance (Not Officially read and referred until adoption of Introduction report).
item.description: First reading, referred to Finance (Not Officially read and referred until adoption of Introduction report).
item.guid: 2025-02-21/First reading, referred to Finance (Not Officially read and referred until adoption of Introduction report).

item.title: 👍💵Candice Bock - Association of Washington Cities
item.description: Candice Bock signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent Association of Washington Cities. They are a registered lobbyist.

item.title: 👍James McMahan - WA Assoc Sheriffs & Police Chiefs
item.description: James McMahan signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent WA Assoc Sheriffs & Police Chiefs.

item.description: Mayor Jim Ferrell signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent City of Federal Way.

item.title: 👎TaraLyn Fray - WSAC
item.description: TaraLyn Fray signed up to testify Con.

item.title: 👍Nathan Olson - Office of the Governor
item.description: Nathan Olson signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent Office of the Governor.

item.title: 👍Mac Nicholson - King County
item.description: Mac Nicholson signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent King County.

item.title: 👎Steve Murray - WSAC
item.description: Steve Murray signed up to testify Con.

item.title: 👍Jeff DeVere - WACOPS - Washington Council of Police and Sheriffs
item.description: Jeff DeVere signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent WACOPS - Washington Council of Police and Sheriffs.

item.title: 👍💵Brad Banks - WSAC
item.description: Brad Banks signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent WSAC. They are a registered lobbyist.

item.description: Sandra Mochizuki signed up to testify Con.
